title: Prohibits the disbursement of any funds under the "green jobs-green New York act of 2009" to the Association of Community Organizations for Reform Now (ACORN)
summary: Prohibits the disbursement of any funds under the "green jobs-green New York act of 2009" to the Association of Community Organizations for Reform Now (ACORN) or any organization which has connections to ACORN.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1259

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  KOLB,  FITZPATRICK, BARCLAY, BOYLE, BURLING,
         CALHOUN, CORWIN, CROUCH, DUPREY, FINCH, HAYES, JORDAN, P. LOPEZ, McDO-
         NOUGH, J. MILLER, OAKS, RAIA, REILICH,  SALADINO,  TOBACCO  --  Multi-
         Sponsored  by  -- M. of A. BUTLER, CASTELLI, GIGLIO, HAWLEY, McKEVITT,
         MOLINARO, RABBITT, SAYWARD, TEDISCO -- read once and referred  to  the
         Committee on Energy

       AN  ACT  to  amend  chapter 487 of the laws of 2009, amending the public
         authorities law relating to establishing  the  "green  jobs-green  New
         York  act  of  2009",  in  relation to prohibiting the disbursement of
         funds to certain entities

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. Section 7 of chapter 487 of the laws of 2009, amending the
    2  public authorities law relating to establishing  the  "green  jobs-green
    3  New York act of 2009", as renumbered by chapter 488 of the laws of 2009,
    4  is renumbered section 8 and a new section 7 is added to read as follows:
    5    S  7.  NONE OF THE FUNDS MADE AVAILABLE UNDER THIS ACT MAY BE DIRECTLY
    6  OR INDIRECTLY DISTRIBUTED TO THE ASSOCIATION OF COMMUNITY  ORGANIZATIONS
    7  FOR  REFORM  NOW  (ACORN),  THE  NEW  YORK  AGENCY FOR COMMUNITY AFFAIRS
    8  (NYACA), ANY STATE CHAPTER OF ACORN REGISTERED WITH THE  OFFICE  OF  THE
    9  SECRETARY OF STATE, ANY ORGANIZATION THAT SHARES DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES OR
   10  INDEPENDENT  CONTRACTORS  WITH ACORN, ANY ORGANIZATION THAT HAS A FINAN-
   11  CIAL STAKE IN ACORN, OR ANY ORGANIZATION THE FINANCES OF WHICH,  WHETHER
   12  FEDERALLY  FUNDED,  DONOR-FUNDED  OR RAISED THROUGH ORGANIZATIONAL GOODS
   13  AND SERVICES, ARE CONTROLLED OR SHARED BY ACORN.
   14    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05194-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 487 of the laws of 2009, amending the public authorities law relating to establishing the "green jobs-green New York act of 2009", in relation to prohibiting the disbursement of funds to certain entities
